Name: Race! Make 'm finish...
About the game: Story Meet Joe. He is a Race Track Engineer. He has to make sure the Race Tracks are free of any obstacles and that the Racers can finish the race. The only thing is... Asteroids Hit! Ohh, ... and sometimes they bring visitors. So, everyday Joe has to clear the tracks, using his trusty tools. He only gets 30 seconds before each race. He has to hurry. Can you help Joe Make â€˜m finish the Race? Gameplay There is a Race going to start. The only thing is, you are not part of that Race, as you are the Race Track Engineer. You need to make sure that the Race can take place, and you have a Car that that has different tools or add-ons you pickup while driving. As you drive around the Race Tracks you come across different obstacles that need to be cleared or you encounter stuck Racers that need to be given an extra push. You can use any of your tools to do the job. Some obstacles like the Walking Plants and the Visitors can only be defeated using your trusty Digger! Besides clearing the tracks, every track needs a Finish Line. It is one of your jobs to put the Finish Line in place at the end of the Race Track. You can push the Finish Line to the Finish..., or you can use your Forklift add-on/tool to put it in place. After the Finish Line is in place it's your turn to go through the Finish Line! Features Drive-able/Drift-able Race Track Engineer Car with 4 interactive Add-ons or Tools 10 Race Tracks and Environments Challenging Tracks, Obstacles and Enemies Steam Gameplay Statistics Steam Leaderboards
